response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Considering its true worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you require any further information or assistance in making your decision. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
